description: Prometheus + node-exporter dashboard for viewing disk performance, utilization and saturation.

targets.expr:
topk(10,
  sum by (cve) (
    count_over_time(
      {job="suricata"} | json | event_type="alert" | __error__=""
      | line_format "{{.alert_signature}}"
      | regexp "(?P<cve>CVE-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4,7})"
    [$__range])
  )
)

topk(10,
  sum by (cve) (
    count_over_time(
      {job="suricata"} | json | event_type="alert" | __error__=""
      | line_format "{{.alert_signature}}"
      | regexp "(?P<cve>CVE-[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{4,7})"
    [$__range])
  )
)

title: Suricata- Zeek-Node-exporter disk graphs
